categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: The Defeat of the Starweird Queen was a battle between the Starweird and the Jedi during the Great Galactic War. For unknown reasons, the Starweird, guided by their leader, the Starweird Queen, decided to use the war as a excuse to annihilate the Jedi and eventually all Force-sensitives. To achieve this end, the Starweird Queen attempted to kill the majority of the Jedi Council, along with the Padawan Xerender. However, the Jedi Master Wyellett, who had fought and won many battle during the war, sacrificed himself in order to save the Council and his Padawan. Due to his sacrifice, Wyellett was captured by the reconstituted Sith Empire. After he was captured, his prison ship was shot down in the Battle of Hoth.
